message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and high-quality craftsmanship, it's truly a must-have. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $95. This limited-time offer won't last long, so I hope you'll consider taking advantage of it today.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within a certain budget. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I'm happy to accommodate you. I would like to offer the product to you at $80, which is still above its production cost and allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin. This price reflects the value we place on customer satisfaction while staying competitive. I hope this offer meets your expectations and enables us to proceed with the transaction.
